About Me

Here is Yifan Xie (Ivan, 谢奕凡).


I am now a Ph.D. student at Tsinghua University, under the supervision of Prof. Wenbo Ding and Prof. Fuchun Sun. Previously, I obtained my Master’s degree from Xi’an Jiaotong University in 2025. I am currently a research intern at X Square Robot.


My research focuses on Robotic Manipulation, Tactile Perception, 3D Vision and Affective Computing. Feel free to reach out for collaboration and discussion of research ideas (Email: ivanxie416[at]gmail.com).

News and Updates

  • [2025.06] Two papers are accepted by IROS 2025.
  • [2025.06] I begin my internship at X Square Robot.
  • [2025.06] My master’s thesis is awarded as the Outstanding Master’s Thesis of Xi’an Jiaotong University.
  • [2025.06] I obtain my master’s degree from Xi’an Jiaotong University.
  • [2025.05] Our paper A Review of Human Emotion Synthesis Based on Generative Technology is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Affective Computing (IF=9.6).
  • [2024.12] Our paper PointTalk: Audio-Driven Dynamic Lip Point Cloud for 3D Gaussian-based Talking Head Synthesis is accepted by AAAI 2025 (CCF-A).
  • [2024.10] Our paper Generative Technology for Human Emotion Recognition: A Scoping Review is accepted by Information Fusion (IF=14.8).
